attributes.title: Siri lied to me
attributes.review: Please don’t download this App. As soon as I downloaded the App (which took 6 months) Siri lied to me. My phone hasn’t been the same since.

attributes.title: DONT GET THIS
attributes.review: It is super slow. I can’t even use the app because it’s so bad. My phone started to get issues when I downloading.

attributes.title: ew
attributes.review: very bad experience gave my phone a virus. did not make america great again. do not recommend

attributes.title: Please delete
attributes.review: it was terrible for anyone . Anyone with there right minds would know this app it’s complete garbage . New feature to vote 0 stars! 😹❤️❤️👍👍

attributes.title: If I could give it a 0 I would
attributes.review: Literally wiped all my games off my phone so bye bye months of progress, absolute trash app

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: When I got this app it took 2 months to download then started showing me p**n ads and gave my device 28 virus’s good thing I wore a mask and then trump texted me his nudes

attributes.title: NOT great 🧚🏽💕✨
attributes.review: The app is very slow and it keeps glitching. Just takes up space on your phone... this app is not worth downloading DO NOT GET !!

attributes.title: STRAIGHT GARBAGE 🙈
attributes.review: Honey... lemme start off by saying this app logo is terrible. I mean the T does stand for terrible after all☺️.  Very low quality app. Also who’s this wrinkly mascot that pops up?

attributes.title: Zero stars
attributes.review: This app was absolutely terrible and awful. After using the app it hacked my phone and have me an awful virus. What a garbage app

attributes.title: worst app i’ve ever used
attributes.review: the app took 17 years to download and when i finally opened it, it redirected me to website that only showed ver graphic photos of roadkill labeled “wish you were here”!!! the utter disregard the president has for roadkill rights is deeply disturbing! i hope that this app will be taken off of the app store to help guard virgin eyes.. 😔
